required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Influence of the Implant Connection on Facial Tissues Maturation
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of the Implant-Abutment Connection on the Ratio Between Height and Thickness of Tissues at the Buccal Implant Zenith: a Perspective Randomised 3d Comparative Analysis on 188 Implants

brief_summary.textblock: The substitution of a tooth with a fixture often induces undesired morphological changes, resulting in a deterioration of the aesthetic appearance. The purpose of this study is to compare the soft tissue behavior next to two different implant connections: 5째 (group 1) and 35째 hexed (group 2), conical, internal with switching platform design after 12 months of functional provisionalization

primary_outcome.description: This measurement (MH) corresponds to the depth of the implant referred to the most coronal point of the buccal mucosa measured according to the main implant axis digitally calculated by 3D software Gom.

primary_outcome.measure: The width (MT) of the peri-implant mucosa
primary_outcome.description: was calculated from the vestibular shoulder of the analogue to the external mucosa point perpendicular to the implant major axis digitally calculated by 3D software Gom.

arm_group.description: Anyridge (Mega'Gen, Korea) 5째 conical internal hexed connection
Core (Bioimplant, Italy) 35째 conical internal hexed connection (screw-vent style)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Missing teeth
- good oral hygiene
- good systemic health
Exclusion Criteria:
- lactation
- pregnancy
- heavy smoking (more than 20 cigarettes/day)
- severe medical conditions that could affect periodontal health and peri-implant tissue response
- use of drugs correlated to periodontal hypertrophy
- bone volume that required bone augmentation procedures before implant placement as well as soft tissue graft or any kind of peri-implant tissue engineering
